extendedInfo.description: The Brewing Assistant from Brewology101.com is an app for assisting in the brewing of your beer. It helps you build your own recipes by calculating your recipe's IBUs, SRM, OG, FG, and ABV while you build your recipe. Both US customary and metric are supported. The Brewing Assistant will also synchronize your recipes to the Brewology101.com Ale Abacus where you can then edit and delete your recipes or create new recipes. With the ability to sync your recipes to Brewology101.com, you can share your recipes with your friends, family, or the entire internet. It also allows you to backup all your recipes and transfer them to the other Android and iOS devices. To import your recipes into the Brewing Assistant from BeerXML, please import the recipes on Brewology101.com. Then to get the recipes to the Brewing Assistant, all you have to do is perform a sync. No need to manually enter all your recipes into your phone or tablet.Once you're ready to brew, the Brewing Assistant will help you with your mash and your boil. The mash reminder will alert you to stir your mash at the interval you set in the Settings. The boil reminder will alert you to add your ingredients at the times you specified in your recipe.The Brewing Assistant is just the help you need for making your homebrew a success.If you find any errors or have suggestions, please let us know at BrewingAssistant@brewology101.com

reviews.title: Great for storing recipies
reviews.comment: I love this app because I can enter recipes online and look them up on the phone later.  Great for going to the brewing store and looking up the ingredients you need.  It also has a notes category which I use to put in starting and finishing gravity, and anything that I did special or different than usual.
reviews.author: Ian Brown

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: This is a wonderful app for those beginner and intermediary brewers. I notice the OG and FG calculations were slightly off, but close enough that its a minor inconvenience. I like that I can start a recipe at home, then take it to work and try.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great! But,
reviews.comment: I wish it had a way to input default settings for equipment, such as boil volume. And be able to input new ingredients.
reviews.author: Brian McConeghy

reviews.comment: Old version worked this one won\'t (previously on os 1.6 now on 2.1)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Good for all grain brewers. Not so flash for extract and partial extract brewers.
reviews.author: Scott Ninness

reviews.title: Good but no metric
reviews.comment: The software is good but can\'t change it to metric system...
reviews.author: Leonel Candel

reviews.title: Great on brew day!
reviews.comment: Really like this app, fun to build recipes on my phone when I am bored. Great on brew day with the times.  My only complaint is that if you hit the brew timer you can\'t turn it off. Other than that, cheers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: works good for me
reviews.comment: See title
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add Mash Strike Calculater
reviews.comment: If a mash strike water calculator was added, I could calculate on the fly to get things right.  Just make sure to enable calibration because every lauter tun is different.  I\'d definitely buy the full version if there was a strike calculator.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitched
reviews.comment: This app is glitched on my phone. Abv isn\'t always calculated. When editing a recipe it will over lap texts everytime forcing me to start completely over just to make one hop change for example.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CalfStone Brewery
reviews.comment: Seems good, but why can I not turn alarms off? Started the brewtimer by mistake, and now I cannot turn it off... Strange...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Looks good but keeps locking and crashing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good to go
reviews.comment: Fairly accurate could be a little better. And a addition a visual of what the SRM will look like would be nice. Be a solid product nonetheless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great. Love the fact you can add recipes online and sync with app. Website imports and export in beer.xml format. Support was fast and solved my issue and answered all my questions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love til be able til create kommer the fly.
reviews.comment: New update fixed it :-) Excelent service from developer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Needs the ability to pause timers.  Also had errors syncing, eventually got em all one at a time.  Built in calculators would be awesome, and yes ibu and srm seem a little off...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Pretty well made app for the home brewer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail
reviews.comment: Only imperial ingredient measures are displayed inspite of selecting metric in settings. No use at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: Ok app but watch for wrong gravities I don\'t think it multiplies by the efficiency. Also ibu calculation and srm are off by a few points.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if add in options for alcohol volume,and time to add the chiller
reviews.author: A Google User
